articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🔥🔥🔥🔥
Great opportunity here for a DAO member to bag some grant funding for their project from our good friends @AlgoveraAI 🫡
If you're building already or have any ideas for #AI projects, check this out. 
$1,000 to the successful applicant.
LFG 🤖
AlgoveraAI: Happy to share that we've partnered up with @developer_dao to set aside a $1k grant for a D_D member and their AI project🔥
Applications close on the 10th 🙌 
Apply here 👇

Reach out to @wise_Tyy for any questions 🙏
 https://forum.algovera.ai/c/proposals/round-8/15

articles.description:
RT Abru Zucchi ⚡️
It's very important to understand the importance of decentralized infrastructure in web3 and where it's headed next year (even more if you're a developer). So I published this article on Medium with valuable information if you want to read it. https://medium.com/@abruzucchi/the-importance-of-decentralized-infrastructure-and-my-prediction-for-how-its-going-to-be-steered-c4cc37b741cc
